var initialState=[];//payload={projrctNumber:"",orderNumber:"",flag: "add"}
export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var _ref=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined,type=_ref.type,payload=_ref.payload;switch(type){case"SET_SLECTEDCHECKBOXLIST":var flag=payload.flag,orderNumber=payload.orderNumber;var newStateSet=new Set(state.slice(0));var newState=Array.from(newStateSet);if(flag){newState.push(orderNumber);}else{newState.splice(newState.indexOf(orderNumber),1);}return newState;case"CLEAN_SLECTEDCHECKBOXLIST":return[];default:return state;}});
